title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 433.2 - Budget or equal payment billing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 433.2 - Budget or equal payment billing

State Regulations

On either the bill or in an addendum attached to or
enclosed with the bill shall be shown: (a) Identification of the type of budget or
equal payment plan if more than one plan is offered. (b) The total of the year's budget or equal
payment amounts billed to the end of the period covered by the current
bill. (c) The dollar amount billed
for tariff items during the same period as in subdivision (b) of this
section. (d) Debit or credit
balance to be shown as D or C on the bill and defined as follows: D Amount due company
C Amount in customer favor

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
433.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
